nodes.text: A mountain was a mass of land that stood significantly above its surroundings. Planets as diverse as Asmeru, Carida, Moraband, Serenno, Ryloth, Geonosis, Oba Diah, Oosalon, and Lothal all had mountains. Those of Alderaan, Vandor, and Scipio were capped with snow, and Coruscant's only uncovered mountain peak was located in Monument Plaza. A mountain from which lava emerged was referred to as a volcano.
